title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the data set. 
2. Try to create a new table group.
